item.title: Printing block with Radio Free Europe logo, 1950-1970
item.description: The iconic shape of the Freedom Bell appears on this Radio Free Europe printer's block as the station's logo.
item.asset-details:
Collections of the U.S. Diplomacy Center
(Photo by Alex Jamison)

item.description: Publication of the U.S. High Commissioner for Germany as a convenience for employees stationed in Germany.
